stephane.vortex.measure¶

From a set of measurement (?), compute the following quantities : - compute vorticity, strain and energy - generate a movie for the first Mdata - track the core. Show the position vs time along both axis - Averaged distribution of vorticity over the entire movie. - Same for circulation

Functions

compute(M)

corse_grain(M[, field])

Compute corse grained vorticity

iterate(Mlist, fun, *args, **kwargs)

load(date, indices[, mindices])

main(date, indices)

movie(M)

track(M[, sigma])
